meta.name: viewport
meta.title: EEACS - Allentown Charter School Serving the Lehigh Valley

meta.name: description
meta.content: Executive Education Academy Charter School is an Allentown charter school that serves students from around the Lehigh Valley in grades K-12. EEACS prepares these students to become tomorrow's leaders with rigorous academics, unique extracurriculars, and more.
EEACS - Allentown Charter School Serving the Lehigh Valley

Executive Education Academy Charter School is an Allentown charter school that serves students from around the Lehigh Valley in grades K-12. EEACS prepares these students to become tomorrow's leaders with rigorous academics, unique extracurriculars, and more.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Executive Education Academy Charter School is an Allentown charter school that serves students from around the Lehigh Valley in grades K-12. EEACS prepares these students to become tomorrow's leaders with rigorous academics, unique extracurriculars, and more.

meta.content: EEACS - Allentown Charter School Serving the Lehigh Valley

div.h2: Our daughter is very willing to go to school in the morning. She is learning more than students at her previous school and her grades are showing this.

div.class: fusion-title title fusion-title-16 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three
fusion-title title fusion-title-17 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-two
div.h2: I chose EEACS because it is a no-nonsense school. It is focused on structure for students and discipline when needed.

div.class: fusion-title title fusion-title-18 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three
fusion-title title fusion-title-19 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-two
div.h2: EEACS has taught my children to challenge themselves and bring up their self-esteem. Teachers show the students respect and discipline, which helps them become more professional. They have become leaders and this will last a lifetime.

div.class: fusion-title title fusion-title-20 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three
fusion-title title fusion-title-21 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-two
div.h2: My children have grown so much with EEACS. The atmosphere in school has inspired them to do better in their academic lives. The teachers have been inspirational, as well. My children are encouraged daily to do better and their teachers are always motivating them. I am so glad they are a part of EEACS

div.class: fusion-title title fusion-title-22 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three
fusion-title title fusion-title-23 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-two
div.h2: After a tour, my husband and I were very pleased with the school and looked forward to our son’s new start. He isn’t getting bullied here, so he can concentrate on his school work and his grades show much improvement.

div.class: fusion-title title fusion-title-24 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three
fusion-title title fusion-title-25 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-two
div.h2: EEACS is a tremendous asset to the Lehigh Valley. Having had the opportunity to interact with the students showed me just how impactful the school’s curriculum and culture are. The students are mature beyond their years and show a confidence that many college students I have worked with struggle to show.

div.class: fusion-title title fusion-title-26 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three

div.h2: EEACS has taught my children to challenge themselves and bring up their self-esteem. Teachers show the students respect and discipline, which helps them become more professional. They have become leaders and this will last a lifetime.

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_3_4 fusion-builder-column-19 fusion-three-fourth fusion-column-first fusion-animated 3_4
fusion-title title fusion-title-27 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three

div.p: Executive Education Academy Charter School’s mission is to implement a leadership academy and business education model that engages students in the school community, prevents them from dropping out of school, fosters self-resiliency, and prepares them to be contributing members in the workplace, college, and the community. Read More

fusion-title title fusion-title-28 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-text fusion-title-size-three

div.p: We invite you to consider employment with Executive Education Academy Charter School in Allentown, PA. Our mission involves the redirection of inner-city youth so that they can become tomorrow’s leaders in business, their community, and family responsibilities. If you have the passion to support our mission, we have rewarding charter school jobs and career opportunities available.
